name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Cut by Zoro
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones is slashed by Roronoa Zoro and temporarily defeated.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Hody can be damaged by the Straw Hats' improved strength.

keyMoments.title: First Major Use of Energy Steroid in Battle
keyMoments.description: Hody consumes an Energy Steroid and instantly recovers from Zoro's attack, demonstrating the pills' dangerous power.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Hody's reliance on artificial power enhancement and foreshadows the consequences of Energy Steroid abuse.

keyMoments.title: Captures King Neptune and Three Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Using his enhanced strength from Energy Steroids, Hody successfully captures King Neptune, Zoro, Usopp, and Brook.
keyMoments.significance: Major victory for Hody that establishes him as a serious threat and gives him control of Ryugu Palace.

abilities.description: Hody uses Energy Steroids to dramatically increase his strength and instantly heal from injuries.

reveals.information: Hody uses Energy Steroids to recover from serious wounds instantly
Successfully captures King Neptune and three Straw Hat Pirates

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Luffy After Two Years
keyMoments.description: Jinbe and Luffy meet for the first time since the Marineford War, reuniting after the two-year time skip.
keyMoments.significance: Important reunion that shows both characters have grown and sets up Jinbe's eventual joining of the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Shocked by Shirahoshi and Injured Hachi
keyMoments.description: Jinbe is shocked to see Princess Shirahoshi outside of her tower and discovers his friend Hachi severely injured from Vander Decken IX's attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Jinbe's protective nature toward both Shirahoshi and his old friend Hachi.

keyMoments.title: Apologizes for Arlong's Rampage
keyMoments.description: Jinbe apologizes to the Straw Hats, particularly Nami, for his role in releasing Arlong from captivity, which led to Arlong terrorizing the East Blue and Nami's village.
keyMoments.significance: Critical moment connecting the Fish-Man Island arc to the Arlong Park arc. Establishes Jinbe's sense of responsibility and deepens his relationship with the crew.

relationships.description: Jinbe reunites with Luffy after two years, showing their strong bond formed during Impel Down and Marineford.

evolutionMoments.description: Joyful reunion at the Sea Forest after two-year separation

relationships.description: Jinbe feels responsible for Nami's suffering because he released Arlong from captivity.

evolutionMoments.description: Jinbe apologizes to Nami for his role in allowing Arlong to terrorize her village

relationships.description: Jinbe shows concern for his injured friend Hachi.

evolutionMoments.description: Shocked and concerned to see Hachi severely injured

reveals.information: Jinbe released Arlong from Marine captivity after becoming a Warlord, which led to Arlong terrorizing the East Blue

keyMoments.title: Captured by Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: King Neptune attempts to escape Ryugu Palace with Zoro, Usopp, and Brook but is intercepted and captured by Hody Jones.
keyMoments.significance: The king of Fish-Man Island is captured, giving Hody control of the Ryugu Palace and the kingdom.

keyMoments.title: Cuts Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Zoro slashes Hody Jones with his sword, demonstrating his improved post-timeskip strength by temporarily defeating the New Fish-Man Pirates captain.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's growth after training with Mihawk, but also reveals that enemies can recover using artificial enhancements.

keyMoments.title: Captured Along with Neptune
keyMoments.description: After Hody recovers using Energy Steroids, Zoro is captured along with King Neptune, Usopp, and Brook.
keyMoments.significance: First time in the post-timeskip era that Zoro is captured, showing the threat level of the Energy Steroid-enhanced Hody.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Sea Forest
keyMoments.description: Luffy arrives at the Sea Forest with Shirahoshi, Chopper, and Sanji, where they find Franky and the Thousand Sunny.
keyMoments.significance: Brings Luffy to an important location where he will reunite with Jinbe and learn about Fish-Man Island's history.
keyMoments.quote: He's the master who is going to coat your younger brother, huh?

keyMoments.title: Reunites with Jinbe
keyMoments.description: Luffy meets Jinbe for the first time in two years, showing his emotional growth and joy at seeing his friend again.
keyMoments.significance: Important reunion that demonstrates Luffy has recovered from the trauma of Marineford and sets up Jinbe's future recruitment.

relationships.description: Reunites with Jinbe after two years, their bond strengthened by their shared experiences at Impel Down and Marineford.

evolutionMoments.description: Joyful reunion showing both have grown stronger

keyMoments.title: Brings News from Ryugu Palace
keyMoments.description: Nami arrives at the Sea Forest with Camie, bringing news about the capture of Neptune, Zoro, Usopp, and Brook.
keyMoments.significance: Provides critical information that will drive the upcoming conflict.

keyMoments.title: Receives Jinbe's Apology
keyMoments.description: Nami is present when Jinbe apologizes for his role in releasing Arlong, who terrorized her village for eight years.
keyMoments.significance: Critical emotional moment connecting back to Nami's traumatic past with Arlong.

relationships.description: Nami learns that Jinbe was indirectly responsible for Arlong's rampage in the East Blue, creating a complex emotional situation.

evolutionMoments.description: Jinbe apologizes for releasing Arlong who terrorized Nami's village

keyMoments.title: Shown Severely Injured
keyMoments.description: Hachi is discovered at the Sea Forest, severely injured and covered in arrows from Vander Decken IX's attacks. Despite heavy blood loss, he managed to swim back to warn the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hachi's loyalty to the Straw Hats and the danger of Vander Decken IX's Devil Fruit powers.

reveals.information: Severely injured by Vander Decken IX's arrows while trying to warn the Straw Hats

keyMoments.title: Reaches the Sea Forest
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi arrives at the Sea Forest with Luffy, leaving the safety of the Hard-Shell Tower.
keyMoments.significance: Shirahoshi is outside her tower, which shocks Jinbe as she has been imprisoned there for ten years.

keyMoments.title: Coating the Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: Den, Tom's younger brother, is working on coating the Thousand Sunny at the Sea Forest when Luffy's group arrives.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Den's role in preparing the ship for the New World journey and connects him to Tom, Franky's master.

abilities.description: Den is skilled at coating ships to allow them to travel underwater and survive the journey to Fish-Man Island and beyond.

relationships.description: Den is the younger brother of Tom, Franky's master and mentor.

evolutionMoments.description: Den agrees to coat the Thousand Sunny for Franky
